info.name: PROP FIRMS CMS
info.description: Complete API collection for Prop Firms CMS Backend

query.description: Optional filter preset: top_rated, most_reviewed, newest (takes precedence over sort_by)
Optional: name, rating, review_count, founded_year, max_allocation, created_at (ignored if filter is provided)
Optional: ASC or DESC (default: ASC, ignored if filter is provided)

request.description:
Get list of active firms with optional filters and sorting.

Filter presets:
- top_rated: Sort by rating DESC, then review_count DESC
- most_reviewed: Sort by review_count DESC, then rating DESC
- newest: Sort by created_at DESC

Response includes:
- assets: Array of supported assets for each firm
- years_in_business: Calculated from founded_year

Get firm details by slug with all related data. Response includes:
- payout_policies: Original flat array (backward compatible)
- payout_policies_grouped: Grouped by program_type for easier UI display
  Format: [{ program_type: "1-Step", policies: [...] }, ...]
Login with email and password. Token is stored in cookie and returned in response.
Get all payout policies. Policies can be grouped by program_type in the public API response.
Create a new payout policy. Include program_type (e.g., '1-Step', '2-Step', 'FundingPips Pro', 'FundingPips Zero', 'Scaling Hot Seat') to enable grouping in public API responses.
Update payout policy. Can update program_type to change grouping in public API responses.

query.description: Optional: Filter by account type ID
Optional: Filter by futures program ID

body.raw:
{
    "account_type_id": "",
    "asset_name": "Forex",
    "commission_type": "per_lot",
    "commission_value": 3.00,
    "commission_text": "$3 per lot, 1 way, 6$ per round trip"
}
